model.error: This field must contain a valid e-mail address.

title.text: Have you ever had a reaction to the vaccine?
Do you have any chronic medical conditions?

options.value: I authorize the hospital to perform the necessary treatment or procedure on me.
I have been provided with information about the vaccine, including its potential benefits and known risks. I have had the opportunity to ask questions and have received satisfactory answers.
I understand that the vaccine may cause mild side effects, which are generally short-lived and similar to those of other vaccines.
I agree to follow any post-vaccination instructions provided to me by healthcare providers.
I certify that I have read and understood the information provided and that I am providing this consent voluntarily and without any coercion.
I acknowledge that all the information I provided in this form is true and accurate.
